title: Drawing, "Decorative Project with Octagonal Representation of Summer", 1815
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen on verso: appunti frammentari per una 'camera da pranzo' con le storie di Paride e Ettore
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Ceres shown in profile sitting upon bench. Another girl shown seated in front.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Project with Octagonal Representation of Summer", 1815.
1815. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3219.
